DOC.brief_summary: Develop evaluate peer navigator intervention assist Korean woman potential breast abnormality , miss first follow-up appointment , complete diagnostic follow-up test .
DOC.brief_title: Increasing Adherence Follow-up Breast Abnormalities Low-Income Korean American Women
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study design intervention assist Korean American woman identify potential breast abnormality Breast Cancer Early Detection Program miss first follow-up appointment ( risk woman ) . Intervention activity include reminder phone call home visit train peer navigator explain importance follow-up procedure , emotional support , help transportation follow-up appointment , translation , organize care child grandchildren medical appointment , assistance overcome barrier follow-up identified initial phase study . The investigator collect extensive process measure include number type intervention activity request deliver order estimate feasibility institutionalize intervention activity . The investigator conduct chart review follow-up survey evaluate effectiveness intervention increase adherence follow-up procedure .
DOC.criteria: Being : Korean American woman Screened Breast Cancer Early Detection Program With potential breast abnormality Having miss first diagnostic followup appointment Not Korean American woman Not screen Breast Cancer Early Detection Program No potential breast abnormality Not miss first diagnostic followup appointment
